main event: An unidentified object was observed near Tucuman, Argentina on November 5, 1962.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a small automobile and appeared to be resting on the ground.
The object emitted a bright bluish light that illuminated the entire surrounding area.
The object had a series of rectangular windows on the side that glowed with a soft white light.
A beam of brilliant white light came from the bottom of the object and swept the ground for about 150 yards.
The witnesses were in a state of shock and astonishment after seeing the object.
sighted object: a disc-shaped object with bright lighting
